website_summaries.verdict: A supportive workhorse sandal that coordinates with many casual outfits.
pros: Comes in Black and Graphite, Espresso and Walnut, and Navy and Light Grey
cons: Technically a unisex style, so colors and design lack femininity

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I've had another pair of Crocs Modi flip flops that have lasted at least 3 years and have only just started wearing out. They have been the perfect flip flops and I was excited to buy another pair. However, after wearing these new ones only a couple days the foot bed developed painful "bumps", glue starting seeping out of seams that shouldn't have been glued, and the top band shrank. I don't know if the pair I received was defective or if these were counterfeit...this is NOT the quality I expected from a pair of Crocs. I really hope this is not the direction Crocs are going for quality.
customer_reviews.author: phil

customer_reviews.title: Very Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace an aging pair I love, but are getting old. This new pair clearly does not have the same arch support as the previous pair. Seems like some changes have been made in the interest of the $. For what these sell for, my feet should go "ahhh" when I put them on. They don't. Update: couple months later, they still suck. Going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stop!  Don't do it. Select another Croc model.
customer_reviews.text: Don't get this product. The other reviews were right. There Seems to be something wrong in the manufacture of this item. There are lumps of higher density material in the sole that hurt the joints of your foot. Had many great Crocs in the past. But, something is wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Gilman

customer_reviews.title: Man I love these crocs
customer_reviews.text: Man I love these crocs. They retain the primary benefit/feature of traditional crocs in that they are made of a unique rubber/plastic/polymer type material. This makes them extremely comfortable and soft, but they are also easily washable and can be easily disinfected and even autoclaved. I wear flip flops in the summer, and some of my other memory foam/standard cushioning flip flops get a bit stinky. The secondary benefit is that these don't look as unstylish and awful as traditional corcs. I'm sold.
customer_reviews.author: badchad

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable with built in foot massage
customer_reviews.text: These are everything I had hoped for and more. The nubby texture of the insole surface is like having a thousand tiny fingers massaging my feet with every step I take. It is amazing that something as cushiony as these can be supportive too. I have had problems with plantar fasciitis in the past and must be extra careful about the shoes I wear. Although these are comfortable enough that I'd be tempted to wear them for long walks I'll force myself to don those hot, clunky walking shoes (aka cross-trainers) with orthotics inside. If you're lucky enough to have healthy feet you could wear these all day!
customer_reviews.author: Mom2OneKS

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: these are by far my favorite flip-flops; they conform well to your feet and curve up in the front so that the toe does not catch against any kind of deviations in the pavement. They have plenty of cushion so that you could literally run in these if you need to but also are nice and comfortable for all day wear or just lounging around (They were comfortable even after an entire day walking around a hot amusement park). The last thing that these excel at is they seem to take on minimal foot odor so whatever compound they use is pretty effective.
customer_reviews.author: tech junkie

customer_reviews.title: Great sporty sandal.  Light and durable.  Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I only wear Croc sandals. They last. They're cheap. They are always lightweight. They never smell. These are the most sporty version of Crocs yet. They really hold on to your feet, but not uncomfortably. You can go for a long walk or a hike in these no problem. I don't really have any complaints, though it took me a short while to get used to the mix of soft and hard padding and the slightly chunkier heel. Now they feel completely natural. Great shoe at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: jorlowitz

customer_reviews.title: Too small, hoping for more
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed in these. I've worn Crocs flip flops for years now and it seems every time I try a new pair lately it is hit or miss. The footbed seems too close to the thong part of the flip flop, making it an uncomfortable fit. I feel like my foot is suffocating. I hope that I can wear these around the house (as I wore them outside once and don't think I can return them) to try and stretch them, but I'm not confident. Crocs needs to get its act together.
customer_reviews.author: kimwithak

customer_reviews.title: After alterations they're very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the bumpy nibs on my skin, hurt the bottom of my feet, so I used a clothing iron (on high) setting on parchment paper to flatten down the bumps. Now they're extremely comfortable! So far after a few months they're long lasting & get cushier over time. I bought a few extras. Warning: DO NOT leave out in the hot sun, they'll curl up and shrink, I had to replace one pair.
customer_reviews.author: spotz44

customer_reviews.title: Modi flip flops are a great replacement for discontinued Crocs Athens II
customer_reviews.text: These Modi flip flops are working out perfectly. We bought these to replace a worn out pair of discontinued Crocs Athens II flip flops, basing our selection on other customers' reviews, for which we are most grateful. We considered other Crocs products, and chose the Modi flip flops because reviews reported that they have good structure and support, which we find to be true. They fit as expected, and provide the desired support and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: AMGardener

customer_reviews.title: Serviceable, not as good as the original.
customer_reviews.text: Seviceable. Not as nice or pleasing as theI originally purchased. The toe piece is stiff and a little uncomfortable. Shoe base seems stiffer, less flexible as well. Will do as a stand in. They need to bring the other better version back. I can never understand companies nowadays that get rid of best sellers and bring in cheaply made substitutes. I buy this brand simply because they are nearly skid and slip proof for walking on wet and/or painted concrete.
customer_reviews.author: Just a Corner of My MindTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love 'Em, But They do Have an Issue
customer_reviews.text: I live in the Hawaiian Islands and these are my daily shoes. We get a fair amount of rain here and, of course, it is a bit humid. Typically the shoes last about 2-3 months and then start to delaminate towards the front. Once I contacted Crocs direct, and got a new pair, but the process was more than tedious. I find the best solution is to use Shoo Gloo and glue the two bits together at the front as soon as they first start to come apart. Not a perfect solution, but it works. Never had this problem with the older Croc flip-flops, just with this newer version. Still love the shoes in spite of this ongoing issue.
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: I am amazed how well the old ones lasted
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace several years old croc modi sport flips that the cushioning was ~ half worn out. I live in Arizona and wear them daily for several hours around home. I am amazed how well the old ones lasted! The new version seems to have more cushion than I remember the original pair had when new!! These are Great and if they last like the originals, I will be very happy!! The price was amazing!! Thanks to Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lee A. Enloe

customer_reviews.title: These are the best sandals I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these and they are just as comfortable as the last pair I had. Never a blister, good traction on wet surfaces and inside of the sandal when foot is wet. I'm expecting 2 years of everyday use like my last pair gave me. These are the best sandals I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Eric P.

customer_reviews.title: Ordered the 14's and they are perfect! I've been wearing them a week and they ...
customer_reviews.text: The reviews stated that they run a but small so I ordered the next size up, which I sometimes have to do anyways because I wear a 13 EE or EEEE. Ordered the 14's and they are perfect! I've been wearing them a week and they are breaking in nicely. I hope they are tough and hold up because it's difficult to find flip flops that fit me.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Riley

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable in any walking environment, long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: Like this style better than my originals from 3 years ago. I wear them as casual daily footwear, and on dry days for playing golf. My originals are Very comfortable walking shoes. Grass, Cement, Asphalt, many trips to Disney, the ocean, shopping, long hilly golf courses. Still wear them, just worn the tread off the bottom, and the grippers from the inside are smooth, but after 3 years! This new pair / style have been awesome so far. Played golf twice, and cruised the local fair plus other walking adventures... The new sole design has even better grip and water dispersement than my old ones... Keep up the GREAT work...
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Nice flip flop
customer_reviews.text: ...but, as others have noted, the thong piece that goes in between the toes does hurt a bit. I only wear them from the locker room at the gym to the car and to the front door of the house, but if I were to wear them for a long period of time I could see it hurting a lot. Otherwise the things do well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are better but very tight in the toe spacer area so ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to go down a size since the new Crocs size 11 were way too big. These are better but very tight in the toe spacer area so that I have marks on my feet after wearing them. I'm hoping they will break in soon, since I won't return these after wearing them a week or so. Crocs really needs to pay more attention to sizing and offer 1/2 sizes. Come on it's 2017.
customer_reviews.author: W. Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Please read comments.
customer_reviews.text: These are well-made however the thing I would say about them is that there a little bit bulky. And they're not very feminine. I mostly use them around the house 2 keep my feet clean however because there are no way of venting up under the bottom they will cause your feet to sweat. So I'm forced to put deodorant on the bottom of my feet some days. I guess that's TMI.
customer_reviews.author: Di B

customer_reviews.title: Crocs Unisex MODI Sport with tiny bumps in footbed, P202636
customer_reviews.text: The Crocs Unisex MODI Sport is OK. I like Crocs. I had gotten used to a different style, with a smooth footbed, but was a bit too large, so I tried these a bit smaller. They fit just right, though I wouldn't mind just a bit more room on the sides. I have wide feet. The footbed is covered with tiny bumps. Not sure why. Still not quite adjusted to that, which means that I am aware of them when I first put the Crocs on, but forget about them shortly. Overall, Crocs are my go to flip-flop. I like the Espresso/Walnut color combo.
customer_reviews.author: Weathered Soul

customer_reviews.title: Seems good for the money
customer_reviews.text: The proof will be in their serviceability and it's way too early to determine that. They are cushioned comfortably and seem to provide decent arch support and a slight heel cup, both of which I need for my feet. The other "orthopedic" sandals that I have cost twice as much, so I'm anxious to see how long these last. I stated that they are "somewhat large" but I don't think I should take the next smaller size, either. I ordered my normal shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff H.

customer_reviews.title: I may exchange for another size as these flip flops were really comfortable and had more support than a thin flip flop
customer_reviews.text: I had these flip flops previously and even with ordering up a size these fit a little too small. I see they are made in Vietnam where my others were from China. I guess the dimensions are a little off. I may exchange for another size as these flip flops were really comfortable and had more support than a thin flip flop, although I wouldn't say they give good arch support. Maybe order a size up when you give them a try!
customer_reviews.author: LovinCleaning

customer_reviews.title: These Are the Most Comfortable Sandals I've Worn
customer_reviews.text: For me, these are the most comfortable sandals I've worn. I've owned many of them. The sponginess and the inclusion of an arch are the best features for my temperamental feet. They come in a lot of different colors... all are well thought. One warning: puppies and dogs love them too.
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre

customer_reviews.title: They fit my wide feet .
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of these before , not exactly the same and these fit the same . I have a wide foot (3E or 4E size 9 0 and these fit perfectly . Someone complained about the little nubs as being uncomfortable , true if you have wimpy feet . I usually walk my dog in the dark barefoot so my feet are tough and I like the nubs because they give you grip when wet .
customer_reviews.author: Rodmiami

customer_reviews.title: Get ya some!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd pair of Crocs I have purchased for my husband. At first he was sceptical about the "Crocs" brand, relating them to the goofy looking clogs, but after wearing them he was hooked. They are comfortable and really wear well. His last pair he had for about 3 years and in Arizona, we wear flip flops daily. They finally failed at the strap between the toe. Highly recommend these as well as any other Crocs brand shoe.
customer_reviews.author: G. A. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat Crocs.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of the unisex flip flop. My dog ate pair #2 (grey/neon green), so I ordered pair #3. I wear them pretty much every minute I am home, in the yard, or around the pool. Cant go wrong with this style. I hope they are never discontinued!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. Durable.
customer_reviews.text: This crocs are complfy flip flops that will not break between the toes easily as others do. The only "bad" thing is that the white top material will not stay white for long, it turns yelowish within a month of use but it does not affect the flip flop other than the visual part of it.
customer_reviews.author: Raffy

customer_reviews.title: Good, well-made casual flip flop that only lacks memory foam comfort.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Good flip-flop that would benefit immensely from a memory foam foot bed similar to the old Nikes. I got these because I cannot find a replacement for the old Nikes I loved--and wore out. (Nike's new version is nowhere as good as the older model). So, Crocs. They're well made, and generally quite comfortable. I should probably give a 5th star, but I'm so spoiled by the old Nikes that I can't.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: It's a tad smaller than the previous purchase however..
customer_reviews.text: Same great quality, same great comfort. This hair is it that smaller then the previous ones I purchased. I seem to buy a pair of Crocs modi flip flops when the bottom wears out, which I might add usually takes about 2 to 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: JDMTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, quality flip flops
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. The first were great and lasted several years. Hopefully I'll get the same from these. Only suggestion is that if there's a hot spot (spot that rubs and makes a blister), it's best to leave them in the sun a little while to soften them and then walk around with them. The heat from the sun makes them pliable and that gets rid of the hot spot.
customer_reviews.author: DPG

customer_reviews.title: Love these flip flops and cushion
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable flip flops I've ever owned. I stopped wearing the ON cheap flip flops a couple years ago because it would hurt my back with no cushion. But these are amazing and give you support and cushion. Just be careful if you plan on walking a lot in the heat, my feet have become sensitive to the bottom if I walked too long in them. But, that was only after walking several miles at the zoo and park while it was hot outside.
customer_reviews.author: HonestBuddha

customer_reviews.title: Great crocx
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful flip flops but only problem is my son is growing like bamboo together with his feets and off course after three months I have to buy new one.this one's was like new good quality
customer_reviews.author: Dusan T.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I had a different style of these and loved them so had to buy another pair but these are slightly different but still in great conform and quality I should have gone with either half a size bigger or 1 size bigger thk
customer_reviews.author: K.YOUNG

customer_reviews.title: Croc's Rock!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd pair of these I have bought. I will probably buy more while they are still available. Very comfy, perfect fit, and sandals with an arch support and easily cleanable. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great flip
customer_reviews.text: Nice, comfortable flip with more support than most flips. Sizing was a challenge: I wear an 8.5 shoe, I first got an 8 which was way too small. I returned that pair and got a 9. The larger size fits well. I think the sizing of these flips is smaller than most shoes.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: These crocs will make you unhappy
customer_reviews.text: the thong that goes between the toes broke completely rendering the most expensive flops i have ever owned, useless. I am 70 yr old florida cracker so i dont run or jump in my flops these days.These crocs have seen only light use. . i have owned at least a hundred pair of flops in my life and have never seen such a good looking, but low quality sandal, ever. I could have bought two pairs of flo jo,s or a pair of reefs for what i have wasted on these sandals. NO way i can recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: denise

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly in a couple of days... Cheap and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I have flat feet and so I have to be very choosy about my flip-flops. Crocs has always been my go-to brand. This flip-flop is one of their trademark ones. It takes some time to fit in your leg (2-3 days) but after that it is wonderful. I wear it all the time: to my classes, to a shopping mall and any other place. They are very comfortable and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Priyanshu

customer_reviews.title: I was blessed with beautiful wide (EEE) feet and bought this in a men's ...
customer_reviews.text: I was blessed with beautiful wide (EEE) feet and bought this in a men's size 11 hoping they would be wide enough and they are. Comfortable foot bed, and decent support. They squeak a little when wet, but nothing terrible and I find the wet traction decent. Color wise I found them a shade lighter than they appear in the photo, not a huge deal. Overall I'd recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: BigSquareHead

customer_reviews.title: Excellent All-Around Men's Flip/Flop
customer_reviews.text: The Crocs Unisex Modi Sport Flip Flop is an excellently designed men's sandal. The rubber nibs on the insole/footbed massage the bottom of the foot while walking. Well-designed and produced! I liked them so much I bought a couple extra pairs as gift for friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: GusGus

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. The first lasted about 3 years and were my primary foot wear during spring, summer, and fall. They endured a lot of abuse and are very ergonomic. I am a proponent of barefoot running and these help when barefoot isn’t an option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but a lot of the crocs seem to be made for wide feet. These the length was good, but they were way too lose in the strap area.
customer_reviews.author: Justanother

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & supportive
customer_reviews.text: These Croc flops provide great support and comfort. I used to suffer from plantar fasciitis brought on by wearing my old favorite (Old Navy flip flops). Once I switched to these I haven't had any problems with plantar fasciitis. You can walk MILES in these comfortably, and I have :)
customer_reviews.author: T.L.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!  Time will tell is as tough as last pair I owned!
customer_reviews.text: The last pair really took a beating and lasted several years. I purchased another pair that fit perfectly, but these were not as snug. Sole was perfect, but the toe part was a little long or something. Still will keep, were not that much looser, jut prefer snug.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Dosier

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pair of shoes, they are comfortable and last a very long time. I have had a couple pairs of these over the years and have loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Grimrivet

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flip flops. Will definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.text: its hard to find a comfortable size 13 flippy floppy. But I wore the traction completely off the bottom of these things because I just love them so much. Took 2 years to wear them out though. I am about to buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: dmMatrix

customer_reviews.title: This flip flops were perfect. I had a pair I bought at a ...
customer_reviews.text: This flip flops were perfect. I had a pair I bought at a thrift store for my daughter that were a size to small for me but she didn't like them so I took them. I wore them for over 2 years before the bottoms were worn out. I bought this pair to replace them but in the correct size. I love them. Thinking about getting another pair.
customer_reviews.author: D. Conover

customer_reviews.title: Best Crocs flip flops ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th pair. This particular style has just the right arch for my feet. I can not wear flat flip flops. I can walk in these for miles & miles. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Guiducci

customer_reviews.title: Item is great
customer_reviews.text: Product is what was advertized even if you go directly to Croc website the price is the same lot cheaper than buying locally same product.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Trenhaile

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my mild heel pain
customer_reviews.text: These are total awesomeness. Extremely comfy and cushiony, perfect for my mild heel pain. After a few hours they cut the sides of my foot, so I'm wearing them for about 2 hours everyday until I fully break them in. I chose the tumbleweed color. Just ordered myself a second pair in dark brown light brown variation. Rest are way too masculine for me. These are fantasmic :))
customer_reviews.author: Aquabubbles

customer_reviews.title: May be a truly good find
customer_reviews.text: Comfort: Love the instep for my arches' sake, and they are very comfortable to wear in general. Starting with a four star rating, but could easily hit a five if these hold up and my toes continue to be OK with the feel between them! Fit: Lengthwise, they are about 1/2 size small. It may be premature to assess the "toe" fit, as I haven't worn them enough yet to know if in between my big toe and second toe will be chafed by the strap between them. I usually stay away from flip flops for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra S

customer_reviews.title: The W8 seemed to fit better as with the W7 my toes when walking would ...
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 7.5 so ordered both the W7 and W8. The W8 seemed to fit better as with the W7 my toes when walking would go over the front edge. I had this model Croc for years till they finally wore out. Loved them. This new pair isn't made the same as the material between the toes is now the same rubber as the rest of the slipper whereas the older one was made out of a cord or something. It definitely was not rubber. So we shall see if it is bothersome or not.
customer_reviews.author: lela

customer_reviews.title: First time I felt safe walking along the pool deck at the Y
customer_reviews.text: My feet don't slide around in these flip flops and they grip the pool deck surface well. The fitting chart worked well for me on the first try, and I recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: George Saridakis

customer_reviews.title: Love these crocs
customer_reviews.text: I've worn this pair regularly for months now. Great quality. Firm, supportive feel. holds up so much better than other flip flops
customer_reviews.author: J. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Crocs ruined a great flip flop
customer_reviews.text: Like the others said there is a hard peice under the ball of your feet that is uncomfortable. This is sad I had the original version of this flip flop best flip flop I have owned. Crocs have ruined a great flip flop.
customer_reviews.author: NICK

customer_reviews.title: Warning: These are dangerous
customer_reviews.text: I hurt myself really bad falling down the concrete steps from my front porch to the concrete below. The bottom of the flip separated from the top and folded underneath the flip causing me to fall. I don't need to say anything else because that say it all.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Shears

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent sizing
customer_reviews.text: Held these up next to another pair of Crocs in the exact same size (the pair these were supposed to replace) and found these are a full inch shorter. Had to send them back. Would have been fine if they had truly been a size 13.
customer_reviews.author: LOTR417

customer_reviews.title: Best flip flop ever!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable as they come. EZ on and off. Great when near water. My podiatrist said they are some of the best he has seen if you have foot pain.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and durable
customer_reviews.text: I love croc flip flops because they have an arch in them so I can wear them all day without my feet getting sore! Plus they last a long time so you definitely get your money’s worth!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Sadler

customer_reviews.title: An okay replacement for the old Modi style
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved his old Modi crocs till they finally gave, bought this as a replacement since they don't sell the old Modi design any more, the same size he wore seems a little bigger/looser in this style but not a deal breaker. I think he would still prefer the old style but this is not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Pria

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable and Affordable Crocs
customer_reviews.text: These Crocs are very comfortable and affordable. I usually wear a half size and it was recommended to go up to the next full size, so in that respect they are somewhat large on my feet but still I'm very satisfied with these unisex modi sport Crocs. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Reynaldo R. Reina

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic flops
customer_reviews.text: These are the second ones I've bought. The first ones were so comfortable and lasted for years just had to get the same ones. Best flops I've ever bough!
customer_reviews.author: john debinder

customer_reviews.title: Love this flip flops
customer_reviews.text: These flip flops are sturdy, squishy, water-friendly and comfortable to wear for long periods. The only reason I'm on my 3rd pair in three years is that they are not dog-resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Moore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Fred Flintstone and me!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased the Croc Yukons. They were a great looking shoe but did not allow enough strap going over the foot. I have several pairs of crocs and never experienced that before so I exchanged them for these and wow!!! By fat the most comfortable pair of crocs yet! I have wide feet and these are a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Denny

customer_reviews.title: These are as comfortable as I'd expect for something I can just run ...
customer_reviews.text: These are as comfortable as I'd expect for something I can just run under a hose and towel off when they get dirty. They feel sturdy and were worth paying a few bucks more than some of the others I saw on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Flip Flop
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable flip flop. Love my Croc's. I still have my original pair from about 10 years ago and they hold up wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Bobo

customer_reviews.title: I was somewhat disappointed bc they hurt my bad foot
customer_reviews.text: When I first got these, I was somewhat disappointed bc they hurt my bad foot. However, I didn't give up on them. After several wears, they finally starting forming to my foot, like the Croc Capri's do. They are made heavier than the Capri's and they work wonderful on by incurable left foot.
customer_reviews.author: SHARON L THOMPSON

customer_reviews.title: So I had to try- like walking on air
customer_reviews.text: Crocs-- 2 sisters swear by them. 1 sister lives in Florida and Crocs are all she wears. So I had to try- like walking on air. Even ordered some clogs. Crocs you win. Feet love them. Price here better than Croc outlet store prices.
customer_reviews.author: kyoung

customer_reviews.title: Super flip flops
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, fits as expected, massages your feet as you walk. Only flip flops I will buy. Very durable, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Favorite around the house/yard shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace a pair that gave out after years of everyday use. So glad to have my flops again.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Great Flip Flop
customer_reviews.text: All from one mode so you avoid the usual problems of the holding parts coming unglued. Good price too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Men, go with the unisex.
customer_reviews.text: Size instructions on Croc website says I wear a 10, even though I wear an 11 in other brands. So I ordered 5 pairs of Crocs; two men's and three unisex. Strangely, all pairs were perfect in length, but only the unisex had straps that fit my instep. I returned the two men's pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Islander

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, good for posture!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a pair of flip flops that I can wear comfortably! I am a big guy with size 14 feet and these Crocs are the best. My back was sore from wearing old, worn out flip flops and my back feels better now with these new ones. Woo Hoo!
customer_reviews.author: Bob S.

customer_reviews.title: Paradise!
customer_reviews.text: Probably my favorite flip-flops ever! This is my 3rd pair in 5 years! Super comfortable and quite durable for foam flops!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. R

customer_reviews.title: Good fir
customer_reviews.text: I had an older pair of crocs but they were too big and sloppy to wear. I ordered these a smaller size and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, sturdy and colorful
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to replace my croc Athena flops from over 5 years ago. They held up great and decided to get the modi- flip ones to try a different pair. They feel great like my others. Look forward to another long life of wear. Price was also comparable to website and cheaper than stores.
customer_reviews.author: L. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Best I've worn at this price
customer_reviews.text: Sufficiently comfortable, decent arch support, good grip on the soles, holds up well to frequent use (they're nearly business attire here in South Florida). I've worn better pairs of flips than these, but they were 3 times as expensive. There's nothing else nearly as good at this price point. And they don't shout "Crocs!" at you, which is a major bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Droll Sobriquet

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes when not dressing up
customer_reviews.text: My favorite shoes when not dressing up. With occasional gout and other foot problems these are my favorite shoes. Wear constantly when at beach and lake. This is my second pair, first still fine, just wanted another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Ted ADD Acres

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Best flip-flop type shoes I have found so far as durability. I have had about 6 pair now and will continue to buy more as long as they are available.
customer_reviews.author: TomCatRanch

customer_reviews.title: Great flip flops
customer_reviews.text: Great flip flops. I bought a pair of these last summer and loved how they don't make my feet sweat on the bottoms. I think it has something to do with the raised dots. they also stay on very well.
customer_reviews.author: DurangoDude

customer_reviews.title: If you like Crocs this fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: If you like Crocs this fits as expected. I do wish they had a model that had a longer lasting heel support. After prolonged daily use the heel compresses and that aggravates a tightness problem in my Achilles tendon.
customer_reviews.author: George L

customer_reviews.title: Same as above
customer_reviews.text: Wearing these every day just about. Very comfortable. Dislike the fact you need to bring back the Modi Flip! Why would you stop producing a product that moved so well, nothing like shooting your self in the foot Crocs
customer_reviews.author: David  Kocsis

customer_reviews.title: Loving them for years
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying these flip flops for years..they fit good and I love the non-slip part of the sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as the older Modi flips.
customer_reviews.text: The fit on these are a little snugger than the older ones, and you can definitely tell they have changed them somewhat but over all they are OK. They are also a little bit narrower than they use to be. I loved my old ones until they had a "blow out" and really wish they would have just left the design alone.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Crum

customer_reviews.title: Fits as they should. My only complaint with Crocs ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits as they should. My only complaint with Crocs is they need some rubber traction or rubber dots on the soles, on a smooth wet surface you will struggle to stay on your feet.
customer_reviews.author: CBS

customer_reviews.title: Ouch! Can't wear these...
customer_reviews.text: Most uncomfortable I've ever worn. The thong cut my skin between my toes almost immediately. For me, that part is too narrow and sharp, although it did fit otherwise fine. Garbage bin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes, They are That Good
customer_reviews.text: This will be pair 3. Love these. They last about a year or so before they compress and loosen up. As long as I can keep getting them, I will....since you can't get them at the Croc stores.
customer_reviews.author: K. Bender

customer_reviews.title: They’re Crocs alright
customer_reviews.text: What can I say. They’re Crocs. A good value at the price point. Have a little arch support and little nodules on them that kinda massage the feet. Comfy
customer_reviews.author: Mangomark

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not good enough
customer_reviews.text: They are almost perfect. The material underneath the heel is soft and comfortable. However, some genius decided to make a "cool" design by combining the hard and the soft materials in a weird pattern; and turns out that they put the hard material under the base of the toes. Uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Arikur

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Good purchasing experience. The crocs are of fantastic quality and have held up from rugged summer abuse (fishing, wading in muddy and/or rocky water, yard work, mechanical work, you name it) I only hope that these will be available for purchase in the future when mine finally wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Definitely great sandals
customer_reviews.text: These flip flops are so comfortable. I guessed they might be due to the fact that they are crocks, and I was right!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Lugosch

customer_reviews.title: I used to have a neon yellow pair of original ones and I loved them. Sadly they broke a couple of weeks ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace an original Modi flip. I used to have a neon yellow pair of original ones and I loved them. Sadly they broke a couple of weeks ago. I tried to get another pair of the original ones for some time, and bought speedo, and Hawiian jelly's but nothing was as good. These are as good and time will tell if they are better. fit exactly as I expected. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Hucifer

customer_reviews.title: MY 4th or 5th pair of Modi
customer_reviews.text: The Modi Sport seems to be a bit firmer than than the regular Modi (I had 3 pairs before the Modi Sport). The part of the strap that goes between the big and second toe is made of plastic for the Modi Sport versus cloth material for the regular Modi, and hence dry much faster. I wear my Croc flip-flop in a lot of wet situation, and hence the Modi Sport is better for my need.
customer_reviews.author: Customer in N Texas

customer_reviews.title: Size w little small
customer_reviews.text: These size smaller so get a larger size by one. If you wear 11 get a 12. Nice shoe just too small. Plastic so not going to stretch out. Search continues...
customer_reviews.author: Peter Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable crocs
customer_reviews.text: Went to Florida, had them delivered there and they arrived on time. Very comfortable sandals, cushiony bottoms, wore them everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandle
customer_reviews.text: My fiance told me not to order these because they were rubber and would rub my feet and I would hate them. Once again she is wrong lol They are very comfortable, the only rubbing I had was from when I was in them for about 14 hours the second day I had them and since not had an issue.
customer_reviews.author: HCAEV

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small but otherwise Great Flip Flop
customer_reviews.text: Great flip flop, but ran small. Bought for my husband (size 9 Men) but was a little short for his foot, so gave to our 16 year old son. If you are going to buy, get a size larger than you normally wear. Fits my son (8.5) perfectly. So overall great product. Went to buy my husband one size up!
customer_reviews.author: Jennilee C. Baewer

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic to put on
customer_reviews.text: OMG. Where have these been? I wear flipflops 9 months out of the year. These are fantastic to put on. Great support, and it's like having your own anti fatigue mat everywhere you go.
customer_reviews.author: CFS

customer_reviews.title: I like them because they have some arch support but they ...
customer_reviews.text: I like them because they have some arch support but they are very tight and there is something off about the arch area....Everytime I take a step it is a little uncomfortable. I'm hoping that as I wear them more, that will go away. I like the overall look and design, just not the most comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: forg2011

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and very comfortable to walk in
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new pair of sandals to wear on hot days but they also needed to be comfortable to walk in. Enter these guys, not only did they fit right on but they are so well cushioned at the sole that I can walk in them all day. I also like that my feet don't sweat in these as they did in some other ones I have bought. I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit. Didn't think I'd like them as much as my older crocs. But man I was way wrong. These are awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: James Hargis

product_meta.title: Crocs Unisex Modi Sport Flip Flop
feature_bullets: Sporty flip-flop featuring dual-density base with fully molded Croslite footbed
